home.titleNormal: Your AI assistant and companion for any occasion.
home.draftEmailDesc: Generate email for any occasion you need.
home.writeEssayDesc: Generate essay for any occasion you need.
home.planningDesc: Plan for any occasion, from holiday to family.
home.assistantDesc: Become your personal assistant. Helping you.

createAccount.title: Let's create an account
createAccount.description: Save your chat history, share chat, and personalize your experience.

api_settings.title: Enter Your OpenAI API Key
api_settings.description: You need an OpenAI API Key to use this app. Your API Key will be stored locally on your browser.
api_settings.getApiKey: Go to OpenAI to get your API key

apiKeyNotWorking.question: API key not working?
apiKeyNotWorking.answer: Make sure you've entered the correct API key. If the issue persists, check your OpenAI account for any restrictions or billing issues.

apiKeyHandling.question: How is the API key handled?
apiKeyHandling.answer: Your API key is stored locally in your browser and is never sent to our servers. It's used only to communicate directly with OpenAI's services.

chatGptPlusRequired.question: Do I need ChatGPT Plus to get an API key?
chatGptPlusRequired.answer: No, ChatGPT Plus is not required. You only need a standard OpenAI account to get an API key.

apiKeyPayment.question: Do I need to pay for an API key from OpenAI?
apiKeyPayment.answer: While the API key itself is free, usage of OpenAI's API is billed based on the number of tokens processed. Check OpenAI's pricing page for current rates.

licenseVsApiKey.question: License key vs. API key
licenseVsApiKey.answer: The API key is different from a license key. The API key is used to authenticate requests to OpenAI's services, while a license key (if applicable) would be for our application.
